/* CommonDao.nearbyEnveduFlct */ SELECT A1.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY DL.ADDR, DL.ORDR, DL.REG_DT) AS RN , DL.* FROM ( SELECT A.INSTID AS ID , '기관' AS TYPE , A.INST_TYPE_CD AS CATEGORY_CD , B.CD_NM AS CATEGORY_NM , A.INSTID , A.INST_NM AS INST_NM , NULL AS PRGRM_NM , A.TELNO , CASE WHEN (LENGTH(A.HMPG) < 1 OR A.HMPG IS NULL) THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(A.HMPG, '://') > 0 THEN A.HMPG ELSE CONCAT('https://', A.HMPG) END AS HMPG , A.ADDR , A.ADDR_DTL , NULL AS EDU_NOPE , NULL AS PRGRM_TRGT , NULL AS PRGRM_SJCT , 1 AS ORDR , A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_INST A LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD B ON A.INST_TYPE_CD = B.CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.APRV_STTS_CD = 2 UNION ALL SELECT C.FCLTID AS ID , '시설' AS TYPE , NULL AS CATEGORY_CD , NULL AS CATEGORY_NM , NULL AS INSTID , C.FCLT_NM AS INST_NM , NULL AS PRGRM_NM , NULL AS TELNO , CASE WHEN (LENGTH(C.EXTNL_URL) < 1 OR C.EXTNL_URL IS NULL) THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(C.EXTNL_URL, '://') > 0 THEN C.EXTNL_URL ELSE CONCAT('https://', C.EXTNL_URL) END AS HMPG , C.ADDR , C.ADDR_DTL , NULL AS EDU_NOPE , NULL AS PRGRM_TRGT , NULL AS PRGRM_SJCT , 3 AS ORDR , C.REG_DT FROM TB_FCL_FCLT C WHERE C.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT D.PRGRMID AS ID , '프로그램' AS TYPE , NULL AS CATEGORY_CD , '유아환경교육' AS CATEGORY_NM , F.INSTID , E.CLSSRM_NM AS INST_NM , CONCAT(EDU_YR, '년 ', D.PRGRM_NM) AS PRGRM_NM , NULL AS TELNO , NULL AS HMPG , F.ADDR , F.ADDR_DTL , D.EDU_NOPE , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT H.CD_NM ORDER BY H.CD SEPARATOR ', ') AS PRGRM_TRGT , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT J.CD_NM ORDER BY J.CD SEPARATOR ', ') AS PRGRM_SJCT , 5 AS ORDR , D.REG_DT FROM TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM D LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_CLSSRM E ON D.CLSSRMID = E.CLSSRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_INST F ON E.CNSGN_INSTID = F.INSTID LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_TRGT_MAPNG G ON D.PRGRMID = G.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD H ON G.TRGT_CD = H.CD LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_INFNT_PRGRM_CLSF_MAPNG I ON D.PRGRMID = I.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD J ON I.CLSF_CD = J.CD WHERE D.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY D.PRGRMID UNION ALL SELECT K.PRGRMID AS ID , '프로그램' AS TYPE , NULL AS CATEGORY_CD , '푸름이 이동환경교실' AS CATEGORY_NM , M.INSTID , M.INST_NM , K.PRGRM_NM , NULL AS TELNO , NULL AS HMPG , M.ADDR , M.ADDR_DTL , K.EDU_NOPE , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT O.CD_NM ORDER BY O.CD SEPARATOR ', ') AS PRGRM_TRGT , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT Q.CD_NM ORDER BY Q.CD SEPARATOR ', ') AS PRGRM_SJCT , 6 AS ORDR , K.REG_DT FROM TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM K LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_SAREA L ON K.SAREAID = L.SAREAID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_INST M ON L.INSTID = M.INSTID LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_TRGT_MAPNG N ON K.PRGRMID = N.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD O ON N.TRGT_CD = O.CD LEFT JOIN TB_EDU_MVMN_PRGRM_CLSF_MAPNG P ON K.PRGRMID = P.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD Q ON P.CLSF_CD = Q.CD WHERE K.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY K.PRGRMID UNION ALL SELECT R.PRGRMID AS ID , '프로그램' AS TYPE , NULL AS CATEGORY_CD , '우수 환경교육 프로그램' AS CATEGORY_NM , R.INSTID , V.INST_NM , R.PRGRM_NM , NULL AS TELNO , NULL AS HMPG , V.ADDR , V.ADDR_DTL , S.EDU_NOPE , CASE WHEN S.WHOL_AGE = 'Y' THEN '전체 연령' ELSE CONCAT_WS(',', CASE WHEN INFNT = 'Y' THEN '유아' END, CASE WHEN SCHBOY = 'Y' THEN '초등학생' END, CASE WHEN MSKLSD = 'Y' THEN '중학생' END, CASE WHEN HGSCHST = 'Y' THEN '고등학생' END, CASE WHEN ADULT = 'Y' THEN '성인' END ) END AS PRGRM_TRGT , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT U.CD_NM ORDER BY U.CD SEPARATOR ', ') AS PRGRM_SJCT , 7 AS ORDR , R.REG_DT FROM TB_ASS_PRGRM R LEFT JOIN TB_ASS_PRGRM_DSTNCTN S ON R.PRGRMID = S.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_ASS_PRGRM_EDU_SBJCT T ON R.PRGRMID = T.PRGRMID LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_CD U ON T.EDU_SBJCT_CD = U.CD LEFT JOIN TB_CMM_INST V ON R.INSTID = V.INSTID WHERE STTS_CD = '111111' GROUP BY R.PRGRMID UNION ALL SELECT MIR.RESRCEID AS ID , CASE WHEN CD.CD = '238101' THEN CD.CD_NM WHEN CD.CD = '238102' THEN '시설' WHEN CD.UPPR_CD = '238103' THEN '프로그램' END AS TYPE , MIR.RESRCE_SE_CD AS CATEGORY_CD , CASE WHEN CD.UPPR_CD = '238103' THEN '환경교육 프로그램' ELSE CD.CD_NM END AS CATEGORY_NM , NULL AS INSTID , MIR.INST_NM , MIR.RESRCE_NM AS PRGRM_NM , NULL AS TELNO , CASE WHEN (LENGTH(MIR.HMPG) < 1 OR MIR.HMPG IS NULL) THEN NULL WHEN INSTR(MIR.HMPG, '://') > 0 THEN MIR.HMPG ELSE CONCAT('https://', MIR.HMPG) END AS HMPG , MIR.ADDR , MIR.ADDR_DTL , MIR.EDU_NOPE , MIR.EDU_TRGT AS PRGRM_TRGT , MIR.EDU_SBJCT AS PRGRM_SJCT , CASE WHEN CD.CD = '238101' THEN 2 WHEN CD.CD = '238102' THEN 4 WHEN CD.UPPR_CD = '238103' THEN 8 END AS ORDR , MIR.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_MAP_INDICT_RESRCE MIR LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD CD ON MIR.RESRCE_SE_CD = CD.CD WHERE MIR.USE_YN = 'Y' ) DL WHERE DL.ADDR IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(DL.ADDR) > 0
AND CASE WHEN DL.TYPE IN ('기관', '시설') THEN DL.INST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') WHEN DL.TYPE IN ('프로그램') THEN DL.PRGRM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') END
AND DL.ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND DL.TYPE = '기관'
AND DL.TYPE = '시설'
AND DL.TYPE = '프로그램'
AND DL.TYPE = '전문가'
) A1 WHERE A1.RN BETWEEN 1+(#{pagePerCnt} * (#{selectedPage} - 1)) AND #{pagePerCnt}+(#{pagePerCnt} * (#{selectedPage}-1))
